explanations.A: The mean is dependent on the sum of all of the values, so large or small values can change the answer easily.
explanations.B: The median is the middle number when the data is ordered. Adding a very large or very small value would only slightly change the median.
explanations.C: The mode is the value that appears most often. Adding one extreme value will not affect the mode.
explanations.D: The range will be affected by adding a very large or very small value, but range is a measure of spread and not an average. The question asked which of the averages is this a disadvantage of.
